title: Invisible columns - SELECT
sql:
INSERT INTO hide_some_cols ( visible_col )
  VALUES ( 2 );

SELECT * FROM hide_some_cols;

VISIBLE_COL
-----------
          1
          2

SELECT visible_col, hidden_col 
FROM   hide_some_cols;

VISIBLE_COL HIDDEN_COL
----------- ----------
          1         99
          2 <null>
